message.content:
We need to determine the “Depreciation” expense that will appear on the income statement. (In the sample data a single depreciation transaction was given and that same number was the result.) In our current set of transactions the only two lines with type “Depreciation” are:

• Depreciation20240101001 on 2024‑01‑01 with an amount of 45747.0  
• Depreciation20240201002 on 2024‑02‑01 with an amount of 74884.67 (the given value is 74884.66999999998, which when rounded is 74884.67)

Since the income statement will report the depreciation expense for the period, we add the two expenses together:
  45747.0 + 74884.67 = 120631.67

Thus the final depreciation item in the income statement is 120631.67.

Below is the answer in the required JSON format.

```json
{"solution": {"Depreciation": "120631.67"} }
```
